releaseNotes.title: Back like we never left
releaseNotes.description: It's been too long. Thanks to the people at octane.gg, we're now powered by an API so this dev doesn't need to manually update game results ðŸ™Œ Hope you like it and tweet me with feedback!

items.title: Where do you get your data?
items.text: Boost Control is powered by [Octane.gg](https://octane.gg). Additional news articles are provided by [Shift RLE](https://shiftrle.gg).

items.title: Nothing seems to be loading. What gives?
items.text: Our service is dependent on Octane.gg's API. Their servers tend to get overloaded on competition weekends.

items.title: Why can't I find player/team/event?
items.text: If it isn't on Octane.gg, it won't be listed here.

items.title: Can you feature my article?
items.text: Potentially. Reach out to me on [Twitter](https://twitter.com/boostctrl).

items.title: Can you add [feature]?
items.text: Probably! Reach out to me on [Twitter](https://twitter.com/boostctrl).

notes.releaseNote: Revamped match results, including overtimes and event stats.
Search for teams, players, and events
